name: Materialz
description: New materials including ores, metals, alloys, cardboard, flax, and dyes.
longDescription:
**Features**

**8 New Metals**
- **Tin**  
- **Aluminum**  
- **Zinc**  
- **Lead**  
- **Steel**  
- **Rose Gold**  
- **Brass**  
- **Bronze**  

**4 New Ores**
- **Bauxite** *(Aluminum)*  
- **Galena** *(Lead)*  
- **Zinc**  
- **Cassiterite** *(Tin)*  

**New Materials**
- **Wood Pulp**  
- **Cardboard** (+ Cardboard Blocks)  

**Note:** All new metals + cardboard can be used for tool crafting.  

**New Systems and Items**
- Dyeing system using **20 new dye items**  
- New plant: **Flax**  
- New items: **Flax Fiber**, **Ash**, **Lime**, **Alkali**, **Crude Glass Mix**  
- **Cloth crafting** using dyes and flax fiber  
- **Nugget crafting** (for all ingots in addon + vanilla)  
- Craftable **Colored Glass**  
- New block: **Crude Glass**
author: Amelia_Cherry

name: Liquids!
description: New crafting recipes allowing you to turn ice, frost, & permafrost into water/magma into lava.
author: Baballerz

author: austrianworm

name: Industrial Plasteel
description: Expand your Materialz plugin with Industrial Plasteel! its a strong Steel Alloy but its tricky to use so watch out!
longDescription:
# Industrial Plasteel

Want to expand your metal variety? Industrial Plasteel comes with rescue!
Introduce Industrial Plasteel metal to your world!

Industrial Plasteel is a Steel Alloy with a very durable nature,
however it doesnt go well with precious metals which are crucial
for strong and fast pickaxes, but that doesnt mean its useless!
Because of durability beating uranium its a perfect choice to
make ur tools last!

Recipes:

**Zinc Sulfide**
1 Zinc Ingot, 1 Sulfur

**Aluminum Carbide**
4 Aluminum Ingot, 3 Coal

**Unstable Compound**
7 Aluminum Carbide, 2 Zinc Sulfide

**Plasteel Compound**
2 Steel, Unstable Compound

**Industrial Plasteel**
Plasteel Compound, 4 Sulfur

**Industrial Plasteel Nugget**
Industrial Plasteel
Crimson Garnet spawns between -12500 and -50000!
author: Immortal SpellDagger

author: ARGmasterPlay

name: Mobility Blocks
description: Move faster! Adds speed paths, ladders, bounce pads, and more traversal tools.
longDescription:
# MobilityBlocks

This addon introduces a collection of new blocks designed to enhance player movement and world traversal.

## Features

* **Paths:** A placeable block that, when walked on, significantly increases the player's movement speed. Intended for creating rapid transit routes or connecting distant areas.
* **Bounce Pads (Planned Feature):** A future block intended to launch the player hundreds or even thousands of blocks vertically into the air. This will provide extreme long-distance traversal capabilities, far exceeding the shorter bounces from existing mushrooms.
* **Ladders:** A classic, climbable block. Ladders can be placed against vertical surfaces to allow the player to ascend and descend walls and structures easily.
* **Additional Traversal Tools:** Includes other items and blocks to assist with navigating the game world.
author: Polar

patchNotes.notes: Added ladders and tweaked path health.
Added ladders and tweaked path health.

name: Tighter Bushlands
description: Makes the bush_lands biome more realistic and overall nicer.
longDescription: An addon that makes the bush_lands biome much more tightly overgrown, just like real life, resulting in a much nicer looking biome.
author: TudbuT

name: Window frames
description: A small mod adding window frames
longDescription:
I've been working on this small addon which adds framed glass panels that can be used as windows. They can be put on glass blocks for the color and they are transparent.
For now there is one model, with a cross section, that I really wanted to add on the game for building.
They are based on carpets, so they may be small bugs related to that.
I plan to add more types in the future.
author: LordGibbon

patchNotes.notes: Fixed the item's texture's folder error.
